Computer Engineer
Institute of Smart Systems and Artificial Intelligence (ISSAI)
700.000 to 900.000 KZT gross per month
Astana / Office 

Research institute conducting interdisciplinary research in NLP, computer vision, robotics, augmented reality, AI servers, and clusters

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Maintain web services
‚Ä¢ Manage AI computational resources
‚Ä¢ Configure complex system software for accelerators
‚Ä¢ Ensure system integration through messaging protocols
‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting and configuring hardware

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with software/cloud solutions (e.g. Microsoft Azure, AWS, SAP ERP)
‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting and configuring hardware
‚Ä¢ Understanding of disaster recovery and service 
‚Ä¢  General understanding of IT infrastructure, including Data Centers;
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in web development and maintenance
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in HPC (high-performance computing) and system software, such as cluster management for AI computational resources;
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in complex system software for accelerators like GPUs, DPUs, or FPGAs, but not limited;
‚Ä¢ Database query language (SQL)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of messaging protocols (REST API, JSON, SOAP API)
‚Ä¢  3+ years of experience
‚Ä¢  Knowledge of Kazakh, Russian and English
